title: Nor truth, nor error, nor day, nor night, but in the evening there shall be light, Zach. 14. 6, 7 being the relation of a publike discourse in Maries Church at Oxford between Mr. Cheynel and Mr. Erbery January 11, 1646.
author: Erbery, William, 1604-1654.
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
